00042 #define B3_SHUFFLE(x,y,z,w) ((w)<<6 | (z)<<4 | (y)<<2 | (x))
00043 //#define b3_pshufd_ps( _a, _mask ) (__m128) _mm_shuffle_epi32((__m128i)(_a), (_mask) )
00044 #define b3_pshufd_ps( _a, _mask ) _mm_shuffle_ps((_a), (_a), (_mask) )
00045 #define b3_splat3_ps( _a, _i ) b3_pshufd_ps((_a), B3_SHUFFLE(_i,_i,_i, 3) )
00046 #define b3_splat_ps( _a, _i )  b3_pshufd_ps((_a), B3_SHUFFLE(_i,_i,_i,_i) )
00047 
00048 #define b3v3AbsiMask (_mm_set_epi32(0x00000000, 0x7FFFFFFF, 0x7FFFFFFF, 0x7FFFFFFF))
00049 #define b3vAbsMask (_mm_set_epi32( 0x7FFFFFFF, 0x7FFFFFFF, 0x7FFFFFFF, 0x7FFFFFFF))
00050 #define b3vFFF0Mask (_mm_set_epi32(0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFF, 0xFFFFFFFF, 0xFFFFFFFF))
00051 #define b3v3AbsfMask b3CastiTo128f(b3v3AbsiMask)
00052 #define b3vFFF0fMask b3CastiTo128f(b3vFFF0Mask)
00053 #define b3vxyzMaskf b3vFFF0fMask
00054 #define b3vAbsfMask b3CastiTo128f(b3vAbsMask)

00061 const __m128 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(b3v1_5)  = {1.5f, 1.5f, 1.5f, 1.5f};

00122     B3_FORCE_INLINE     b3SimdFloat4    get128() const
00123     {
00124         return mVec128;
00125     }

00138         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& operator+=(const b3Vector3& v)
00139         {
00140 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00141                 mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00142 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00143                 mVec128 = vaddq_f32(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00144 #else
00145                 m_floats[0] += v.m_floats[0];
00146                 m_floats[1] += v.m_floats[1];
00147                 m_floats[2] += v.m_floats[2];
00148 #endif
00149                 return *this;
00150         }
00151 
00152 
00155         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& operator-=(const b3Vector3& v)
00156         {
00157 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00158                 mVec128 = _mm_sub_ps(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00159 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00160                 mVec128 = vsubq_f32(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00161 #else
00162                 m_floats[0] -= v.m_floats[0];
00163                 m_floats[1] -= v.m_floats[1];
00164                 m_floats[2] -= v.m_floats[2];
00165 #endif
00166                 return *this;
00167         }
00168 
00171         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& operator*=(const b3Scalar& s)
00172         {
00173 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00174                 __m128  vs = _mm_load_ss(&s);   //      (S 0 0 0)
00175                 vs = b3_pshufd_ps(vs, 0x80);    //      (S S S 0.0)
00176                 mVec128 = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, vs);
00177 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00178                 mVec128 = vmulq_n_f32(mVec128, s);
00179 #else
00180                 m_floats[0] *= s;
00181                 m_floats[1] *= s;
00182                 m_floats[2] *= s;
00183 #endif
00184                 return *this;
00185         }
00186 
00189         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& operator/=(const b3Scalar& s)
00190         {
00191                 b3FullAssert(s != b3Scalar(0.0));
00192 
00193 #if 0 //defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API)
00194 // this code is not faster !
00195                 __m128 vs = _mm_load_ss(&s);
00196                 vs = _mm_div_ss(b3v1110, vs);
00197                 vs = b3_pshufd_ps(vs, 0x00);    //      (S S S S)
00198 
00199                 mVec128 = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, vs);
00200 
00201                 return *this;
00202 #else
00203                 return *this *= b3Scalar(1.0) / s;
00204 #endif
00205         }
00206 
00209         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar dot(const b3Vector3& v) const
00210         {
00211 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00212                 __m128 vd = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00213                 __m128 z = _mm_movehl_ps(vd, vd);
00214                 __m128 y = _mm_shuffle_ps(vd, vd, 0x55);
00215                 vd = _mm_add_ss(vd, y);
00216                 vd = _mm_add_ss(vd, z);
00217                 return _mm_cvtss_f32(vd);
00218 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00219                 float32x4_t vd = vmulq_f32(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00220                 float32x2_t x = vpadd_f32(vget_low_f32(vd), vget_low_f32(vd));
00221                 x = vadd_f32(x, vget_high_f32(vd));
00222                 return vget_lane_f32(x, 0);
00223 #else
00224                 return  m_floats[0] * v.m_floats[0] +
00225                                 m_floats[1] * v.m_floats[1] +
00226                                 m_floats[2] * v.m_floats[2];
00227 #endif
00228         }
00229 
00231         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar length2() const
00232         {
00233                 return dot(*this);
00234         }
00235 
00237         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar length() const
00238         {
00239                 return b3Sqrt(length2());
00240         }

00250         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& safeNormalize()
00251         {
00252                 b3Scalar l2 = length2();
00253                 //triNormal.normalize();
00254                 if (l2 >= B3_EPSILON*B3_EPSILON)
00255                 {
00256                         (*this) /= b3Sqrt(l2);
00257                 }
00258                 else
00259                 {
00260                         setValue(1, 0, 0);
00261                 }
00262                 return *this;
00263         }
00264 
00267         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& normalize()
00268         {
00269 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00270         // dot product first
00271                 __m128 vd = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, mVec128);
00272                 __m128 z = _mm_movehl_ps(vd, vd);
00273                 __m128 y = _mm_shuffle_ps(vd, vd, 0x55);
00274                 vd = _mm_add_ss(vd, y);
00275                 vd = _mm_add_ss(vd, z);
00276 
00277         #if 0
00278         vd = _mm_sqrt_ss(vd);
00279                 vd = _mm_div_ss(b3v1110, vd);
00280                 vd = b3_splat_ps(vd, 0x80);
00281                 mVec128 = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, vd);
00282         #else
00283 
00284         // NR step 1/sqrt(x) - vd is x, y is output
00285         y = _mm_rsqrt_ss(vd); // estimate
00286 
00287         //  one step NR
00288         z = b3v1_5;
00289         vd = _mm_mul_ss(vd, b3vHalf); // vd * 0.5
00290         //x2 = vd;
00291         vd = _mm_mul_ss(vd, y); // vd * 0.5 * y0
00292         vd = _mm_mul_ss(vd, y); // vd * 0.5 * y0 * y0
00293         z = _mm_sub_ss(z, vd);  // 1.5 - vd * 0.5 * y0 * y0
00294 
00295         y = _mm_mul_ss(y, z);   // y0 * (1.5 - vd * 0.5 * y0 * y0)
00296 
00297                 y = b3_splat_ps(y, 0x80);
00298                 mVec128 = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, y);
00299 
00300         #endif
00301 
00302 
00303                 return *this;
00304 #else
00305                 return *this /= length();
00306 #endif
00307         }

00319         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar angle(const b3Vector3& v) const
00320         {
00321                 b3Scalar s = b3Sqrt(length2() * v.length2());
00322                 b3FullAssert(s != b3Scalar(0.0));
00323                 return b3Acos(dot(v) / s);
00324         }

00327         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 absolute() const
00328         {
00329 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00330                 return b3MakeVector3(_mm_and_ps(mVec128, b3v3AbsfMask));
00331 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00332                 return b3Vector3(vabsq_f32(mVec128));
00333 #else
00334                 return b3MakeVector3(
00335                         b3Fabs(m_floats[0]),
00336                         b3Fabs(m_floats[1]),
00337                         b3Fabs(m_floats[2]));
00338 #endif
00339         }
00340 
00343         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 cross(const b3Vector3& v) const
00344         {
00345 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00346                 __m128  T, V;
00347 
00348                 T = b3_pshufd_ps(mVec128, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));      //      (Y Z X 0)
00349                 V = b3_pshufd_ps(v.mVec128, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));    //      (Y Z X 0)
00350 
00351                 V = _mm_mul_ps(V, mVec128);
00352                 T = _mm_mul_ps(T, v.mVec128);
00353                 V = _mm_sub_ps(V, T);
00354 
00355                 V = b3_pshufd_ps(V, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));
00356                 return b3MakeVector3(V);
00357 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00358                 float32x4_t T, V;
00359                 // form (Y, Z, X, _) of mVec128 and v.mVec128
00360                 float32x2_t Tlow = vget_low_f32(mVec128);
00361                 float32x2_t Vlow = vget_low_f32(v.mVec128);
00362                 T = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Tlow, vget_high_f32(mVec128), 1), Tlow);
00363                 V = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Vlow, vget_high_f32(v.mVec128), 1), Vlow);
00364 
00365                 V = vmulq_f32(V, mVec128);
00366                 T = vmulq_f32(T, v.mVec128);
00367                 V = vsubq_f32(V, T);
00368                 Vlow = vget_low_f32(V);
00369                 // form (Y, Z, X, _);
00370                 V = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Vlow, vget_high_f32(V), 1), Vlow);
00371                 V = (float32x4_t)vandq_s32((int32x4_t)V, b3vFFF0Mask);
00372 
00373                 return b3Vector3(V);
00374 #else
00375                 return b3MakeVector3(
00376                         m_floats[1] * v.m_floats[2] - m_floats[2] * v.m_floats[1],
00377                         m_floats[2] * v.m_floats[0] - m_floats[0] * v.m_floats[2],
00378                         m_floats[0] * v.m_floats[1] - m_floats[1] * v.m_floats[0]);
00379 #endif
00380         }
00381 
00382         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar triple(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2) const
00383         {
00384 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00385                 // cross:
00386                 __m128 T = _mm_shuffle_ps(v1.mVec128, v1.mVec128, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));      //      (Y Z X 0)
00387                 __m128 V = _mm_shuffle_ps(v2.mVec128, v2.mVec128, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));      //      (Y Z X 0)
00388 
00389                 V = _mm_mul_ps(V, v1.mVec128);
00390                 T = _mm_mul_ps(T, v2.mVec128);
00391                 V = _mm_sub_ps(V, T);
00392 
00393                 V = _mm_shuffle_ps(V, V, B3_SHUFFLE(1, 2, 0, 3));
00394 
00395                 // dot:
00396                 V = _mm_mul_ps(V, mVec128);
00397                 __m128 z = _mm_movehl_ps(V, V);
00398                 __m128 y = _mm_shuffle_ps(V, V, 0x55);
00399                 V = _mm_add_ss(V, y);
00400                 V = _mm_add_ss(V, z);
00401                 return _mm_cvtss_f32(V);
00402 
00403 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00404                 // cross:
00405                 float32x4_t T, V;
00406                 // form (Y, Z, X, _) of mVec128 and v.mVec128
00407                 float32x2_t Tlow = vget_low_f32(v1.mVec128);
00408                 float32x2_t Vlow = vget_low_f32(v2.mVec128);
00409                 T = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Tlow, vget_high_f32(v1.mVec128), 1), Tlow);
00410                 V = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Vlow, vget_high_f32(v2.mVec128), 1), Vlow);
00411 
00412                 V = vmulq_f32(V, v1.mVec128);
00413                 T = vmulq_f32(T, v2.mVec128);
00414                 V = vsubq_f32(V, T);
00415                 Vlow = vget_low_f32(V);
00416                 // form (Y, Z, X, _);
00417                 V = vcombine_f32(vext_f32(Vlow, vget_high_f32(V), 1), Vlow);
00418 
00419                 // dot:
00420                 V = vmulq_f32(mVec128, V);
00421                 float32x2_t x = vpadd_f32(vget_low_f32(V), vget_low_f32(V));
00422                 x = vadd_f32(x, vget_high_f32(V));
00423                 return vget_lane_f32(x, 0);
00424 #else
00425                 return
00426                         m_floats[0] * (v1.m_floats[1] * v2.m_floats[2] - v1.m_floats[2] * v2.m_floats[1]) +
00427                         m_floats[1] * (v1.m_floats[2] * v2.m_floats[0] - v1.m_floats[0] * v2.m_floats[2]) +
00428                         m_floats[2] * (v1.m_floats[0] * v2.m_floats[1] - v1.m_floats[1] * v2.m_floats[0]);
00429 #endif
00430         }
00431 
00434         B3_FORCE_INLINE int minAxis() const
00435         {
00436                 return m_floats[0] < m_floats[1] ? (m_floats[0] <m_floats[2] ? 0 : 2) : (m_floats[1] <m_floats[2] ? 1 : 2);
00437         }
00438 
00441         B3_FORCE_INLINE int maxAxis() const
00442         {
00443                 return m_floats[0] < m_floats[1] ? (m_floats[1] <m_floats[2] ? 2 : 1) : (m_floats[0] <m_floats[2] ? 2 : 0);
00444         }
00445 
00446         B3_FORCE_INLINE int furthestAxis() const
00447         {
00448                 return absolute().minAxis();
00449         }
00450 
00451         B3_FORCE_INLINE int closestAxis() const
00452         {
00453                 return absolute().maxAxis();
00454         }

00457         B3_FORCE_INLINE void setInterpolate3(const b3Vector3& v0, const b3Vector3& v1, b3Scalar rt)
00458         {
00459 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00460                 __m128  vrt = _mm_load_ss(&rt); //      (rt 0 0 0)
00461                 b3Scalar s = b3Scalar(1.0) - rt;
00462                 __m128  vs = _mm_load_ss(&s);   //      (S 0 0 0)
00463                 vs = b3_pshufd_ps(vs, 0x80);    //      (S S S 0.0)
00464                 __m128 r0 = _mm_mul_ps(v0.mVec128, vs);
00465                 vrt = b3_pshufd_ps(vrt, 0x80);  //      (rt rt rt 0.0)
00466                 __m128 r1 = _mm_mul_ps(v1.mVec128, vrt);
00467                 __m128 tmp3 = _mm_add_ps(r0,r1);
00468                 mVec128 = tmp3;
00469 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00470                 float32x4_t vl = vsubq_f32(v1.mVec128, v0.mVec128);
00471                 vl = vmulq_n_f32(vl, rt);
00472                 mVec128 = vaddq_f32(vl, v0.mVec128);
00473 #else
00474                 b3Scalar s = b3Scalar(1.0) - rt;
00475                 m_floats[0] = s * v0.m_floats[0] + rt * v1.m_floats[0];
00476                 m_floats[1] = s * v0.m_floats[1] + rt * v1.m_floats[1];
00477                 m_floats[2] = s * v0.m_floats[2] + rt * v1.m_floats[2];
00478                 //don't do the unused w component
00479                 //              m_co[3] = s * v0[3] + rt * v1[3];
00480 #endif
00481         }
00482 
00486         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 lerp(const b3Vector3& v, const b3Scalar& t) const
00487         {
00488 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00489                 __m128  vt = _mm_load_ss(&t);   //      (t 0 0 0)
00490                 vt = b3_pshufd_ps(vt, 0x80);    //      (rt rt rt 0.0)
00491                 __m128 vl = _mm_sub_ps(v.mVec128, mVec128);
00492                 vl = _mm_mul_ps(vl, vt);
00493                 vl = _mm_add_ps(vl, mVec128);
00494 
00495                 return b3MakeVector3(vl);
00496 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00497                 float32x4_t vl = vsubq_f32(v.mVec128, mVec128);
00498                 vl = vmulq_n_f32(vl, t);
00499                 vl = vaddq_f32(vl, mVec128);
00500 
00501                 return b3Vector3(vl);
00502 #else
00503                 return
00504                         b3MakeVector3(  m_floats[0] + (v.m_floats[0] - m_floats[0]) * t,
00505                                                 m_floats[1] + (v.m_floats[1] - m_floats[1]) * t,
00506                                                 m_floats[2] + (v.m_floats[2] - m_floats[2]) * t);
00507 #endif
00508         }
00509 
00512         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3& operator*=(const b3Vector3& v)
00513         {
00514 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00515                 mVec128 = _mm_mul_ps(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00516 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00517                 mVec128 = vmulq_f32(mVec128, v.mVec128);
00518 #else
00519                 m_floats[0] *= v.m_floats[0];
00520                 m_floats[1] *= v.m_floats[1];
00521                 m_floats[2] *= v.m_floats[2];
00522 #endif
00523                 return *this;
00524         }
00525 
00527                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getX() const { return m_floats[0]; }
00529                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getY() const { return m_floats[1]; }
00531                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getZ() const { return m_floats[2]; }
00533                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getW() const { return m_floats[3]; }
00534 
00536                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setX(b3Scalar _x) { m_floats[0] = _x;};
00538                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setY(b3Scalar _y) { m_floats[1] = _y;};
00540                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setZ(b3Scalar _z) { m_floats[2] = _z;};
00542                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setW(b3Scalar _w) { m_floats[3] = _w;};
00543 
00544         //B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar&       operator[](int i)       { return (&m_floats[0])[i];   }
00545         //B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& operator[](int i) const { return (&m_floats[0])[i]; }
00547         B3_FORCE_INLINE operator       b3Scalar *()       { return &m_floats[0]; }
00548         B3_FORCE_INLINE operator const b3Scalar *() const { return &m_floats[0]; }
00549 
00550         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool    operator==(const b3Vector3& other) const
00551         {
00552 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00553         return (0xf == _mm_movemask_ps((__m128)_mm_cmpeq_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128)));
00554 #else
00555                 return ((m_floats[3]==other.m_floats[3]) &&
00556                 (m_floats[2]==other.m_floats[2]) &&
00557                 (m_floats[1]==other.m_floats[1]) &&
00558                 (m_floats[0]==other.m_floats[0]));
00559 #endif
00560         }
00561 
00562         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool    operator!=(const b3Vector3& other) const
00563         {
00564                 return !(*this == other);
00565         }
00566 
00570         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setMax(const b3Vector3& other)
00571         {
00572 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00573                 mVec128 = _mm_max_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00574 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00575                 mVec128 = vmaxq_f32(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00576 #else
00577                 b3SetMax(m_floats[0], other.m_floats[0]);
00578                 b3SetMax(m_floats[1], other.m_floats[1]);
00579                 b3SetMax(m_floats[2], other.m_floats[2]);
00580                 b3SetMax(m_floats[3], other.m_floats[3]);
00581 #endif
00582         }
00583 
00587         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setMin(const b3Vector3& other)
00588         {
00589 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00590                 mVec128 = _mm_min_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00591 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00592                 mVec128 = vminq_f32(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00593 #else
00594                 b3SetMin(m_floats[0], other.m_floats[0]);
00595                 b3SetMin(m_floats[1], other.m_floats[1]);
00596                 b3SetMin(m_floats[2], other.m_floats[2]);
00597                 b3SetMin(m_floats[3], other.m_floats[3]);
00598 #endif
00599         }
00600 
00601         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setValue(const b3Scalar& _x, const b3Scalar& _y, const b3Scalar& _z)
00602         {
00603                 m_floats[0]=_x;
00604                 m_floats[1]=_y;
00605                 m_floats[2]=_z;
00606                 m_floats[3] = b3Scalar(0.f);
00607         }
00608 
00609         void    getSkewSymmetricMatrix(b3Vector3* v0,b3Vector3* v1,b3Vector3* v2) const
00610         {
00611 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00612 
00613                 __m128 V  = _mm_and_ps(mVec128, b3vFFF0fMask);
00614                 __m128 V0 = _mm_xor_ps(b3vMzeroMask, V);
00615                 __m128 V2 = _mm_movelh_ps(V0, V);
00616 
00617                 __m128 V1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(V, V0, 0xCE);
00618 
00619         V0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(V0, V, 0xDB);
00620                 V2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(V2, V, 0xF9);
00621 
00622                 v0->mVec128 = V0;
00623                 v1->mVec128 = V1;
00624                 v2->mVec128 = V2;
00625 #else
00626                 v0->setValue(0.         ,-getZ()                ,getY());
00627                 v1->setValue(getZ()     ,0.                     ,-getX());
00628                 v2->setValue(-getY()    ,getX() ,0.);
00629 #endif
00630         }
00631 
00632         void setZero()
00633         {
00634 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00635                 mVec128 = (__m128)_mm_xor_ps(mVec128, mVec128);
00636 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00637                 int32x4_t vi = vdupq_n_s32(0);
00638                 mVec128 = vreinterpretq_f32_s32(vi);
00639 #else
00640                 setValue(b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00641 #endif
00642         }
00643 
00644         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool isZero() const
00645         {
00646                 return m_floats[0] == b3Scalar(0) && m_floats[1] == b3Scalar(0) && m_floats[2] == b3Scalar(0);
00647         }
00648 
00649         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool fuzzyZero() const
00650         {
00651                 return length2() < B3_EPSILON;
00652         }
00653 
00654         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    serialize(struct        b3Vector3Data& dataOut) const;
00655 
00656         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    deSerialize(const struct        b3Vector3Data& dataIn);
00657 
00658         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    serializeFloat(struct   b3Vector3FloatData& dataOut) const;
00659 
00660         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    deSerializeFloat(const struct   b3Vector3FloatData& dataIn);
00661 
00662         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    serializeDouble(struct  b3Vector3DoubleData& dataOut) const;
00663 
00664         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    deSerializeDouble(const struct  b3Vector3DoubleData& dataIn);
00665 
00670         B3_FORCE_INLINE   long    maxDot( const b3Vector3 *array, long array_count, b3Scalar &dotOut ) const;
00671 
00676         B3_FORCE_INLINE   long    minDot( const b3Vector3 *array, long array_count, b3Scalar &dotOut ) const;
00677 
00678     /* create a vector as  b3Vector3( this->dot( b3Vector3 v0 ), this->dot( b3Vector3 v1), this->dot( b3Vector3 v2 ))  */
00679     B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3  dot3( const b3Vector3 &v0, const b3Vector3 &v1, const b3Vector3 &v2 ) const
00680     {
00681 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00682 
00683         __m128 a0 = _mm_mul_ps( v0.mVec128, this->mVec128 );
00684         __m128 a1 = _mm_mul_ps( v1.mVec128, this->mVec128 );
00685         __m128 a2 = _mm_mul_ps( v2.mVec128, this->mVec128 );
00686         __m128 b0 = _mm_unpacklo_ps( a0, a1 );
00687         __m128 b1 = _mm_unpackhi_ps( a0, a1 );
00688         __m128 b2 = _mm_unpacklo_ps( a2, _mm_setzero_ps() );
00689         __m128 r = _mm_movelh_ps( b0, b2 );
00690         r = _mm_add_ps( r, _mm_movehl_ps( b2, b0 ));
00691         a2 = _mm_and_ps( a2, b3vxyzMaskf);
00692         r = _mm_add_ps( r, b3CastdTo128f (_mm_move_sd( b3CastfTo128d(a2), b3CastfTo128d(b1) )));
00693         return b3MakeVector3(r);
00694 
00695 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00696         static const uint32x4_t xyzMask = (const uint32x4_t){ -1, -1, -1, 0 };
00697         float32x4_t a0 = vmulq_f32( v0.mVec128, this->mVec128);
00698         float32x4_t a1 = vmulq_f32( v1.mVec128, this->mVec128);
00699         float32x4_t a2 = vmulq_f32( v2.mVec128, this->mVec128);
00700         float32x2x2_t zLo = vtrn_f32( vget_high_f32(a0), vget_high_f32(a1));
00701         a2 = (float32x4_t) vandq_u32((uint32x4_t) a2, xyzMask );
00702         float32x2_t b0 = vadd_f32( vpadd_f32( vget_low_f32(a0), vget_low_f32(a1)), zLo.val[0] );
00703         float32x2_t b1 = vpadd_f32( vpadd_f32( vget_low_f32(a2), vget_high_f32(a2)), vdup_n_f32(0.0f));
00704         return b3Vector3( vcombine_f32(b0, b1) );
00705 #else
00706                 return b3MakeVector3( dot(v0), dot(v1), dot(v2));
00707 #endif
00708     }
00709 };
00710 
00712 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00713 operator+(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2)
00714 {
00715 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00716         return b3MakeVector3(_mm_add_ps(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128));
00717 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00718         return b3MakeVector3(vaddq_f32(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128));
00719 #else
00720         return b3MakeVector3(
00721                         v1.m_floats[0] + v2.m_floats[0],
00722                         v1.m_floats[1] + v2.m_floats[1],
00723                         v1.m_floats[2] + v2.m_floats[2]);
00724 #endif
00725 }
00726 
00728 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00729 operator*(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2)
00730 {
00731 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00732         return b3MakeVector3(_mm_mul_ps(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128));
00733 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00734         return b3MakeVector3(vmulq_f32(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128));
00735 #else
00736         return b3MakeVector3(
00737                         v1.m_floats[0] * v2.m_floats[0],
00738                         v1.m_floats[1] * v2.m_floats[1],
00739                         v1.m_floats[2] * v2.m_floats[2]);
00740 #endif
00741 }
00742 
00744 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00745 operator-(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2)
00746 {
00747 #if (defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API)  && defined(B3_USE_SSE))
00748 
00749         //      without _mm_and_ps this code causes slowdown in Concave moving
00750         __m128 r = _mm_sub_ps(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128);
00751         return b3MakeVector3(_mm_and_ps(r, b3vFFF0fMask));
00752 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00753         float32x4_t r = vsubq_f32(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128);
00754         return b3MakeVector3((float32x4_t)vandq_s32((int32x4_t)r, b3vFFF0Mask));
00755 #else
00756         return b3MakeVector3(
00757                         v1.m_floats[0] - v2.m_floats[0],
00758                         v1.m_floats[1] - v2.m_floats[1],
00759                         v1.m_floats[2] - v2.m_floats[2]);
00760 #endif
00761 }
00762 
00764 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00765 operator-(const b3Vector3& v)
00766 {
00767 #if (defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE))
00768         __m128 r = _mm_xor_ps(v.mVec128, b3vMzeroMask);
00769         return b3MakeVector3(_mm_and_ps(r, b3vFFF0fMask));
00770 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00771         return b3MakeVector3((b3SimdFloat4)veorq_s32((int32x4_t)v.mVec128, (int32x4_t)b3vMzeroMask));
00772 #else
00773         return b3MakeVector3(-v.m_floats[0], -v.m_floats[1], -v.m_floats[2]);
00774 #endif
00775 }
00776 
00778 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00779 operator*(const b3Vector3& v, const b3Scalar& s)
00780 {
00781 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00782         __m128  vs = _mm_load_ss(&s);   //      (S 0 0 0)
00783         vs = b3_pshufd_ps(vs, 0x80);    //      (S S S 0.0)
00784         return b3MakeVector3(_mm_mul_ps(v.mVec128, vs));
00785 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00786         float32x4_t r = vmulq_n_f32(v.mVec128, s);
00787         return b3MakeVector3((float32x4_t)vandq_s32((int32x4_t)r, b3vFFF0Mask));
00788 #else
00789         return b3MakeVector3(v.m_floats[0] * s, v.m_floats[1] * s, v.m_floats[2] * s);
00790 #endif
00791 }
00792 
00794 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00795 operator*(const b3Scalar& s, const b3Vector3& v)
00796 {
00797         return v * s;
00798 }
00799 
00801 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00802 operator/(const b3Vector3& v, const b3Scalar& s)
00803 {
00804         b3FullAssert(s != b3Scalar(0.0));
00805 #if 0 //defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API)
00806 // this code is not faster !
00807         __m128 vs = _mm_load_ss(&s);
00808     vs = _mm_div_ss(b3v1110, vs);
00809         vs = b3_pshufd_ps(vs, 0x00);    //      (S S S S)
00810 
00811         return b3Vector3(_mm_mul_ps(v.mVec128, vs));
00812 #else
00813         return v * (b3Scalar(1.0) / s);
00814 #endif
00815 }
00816 
00818 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00819 operator/(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2)
00820 {
00821 #if (defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API)&& defined (B3_USE_SSE))
00822         __m128 vec = _mm_div_ps(v1.mVec128, v2.mVec128);
00823         vec = _mm_and_ps(vec, b3vFFF0fMask);
00824         return b3MakeVector3(vec);
00825 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00826         float32x4_t x, y, v, m;
00827 
00828         x = v1.mVec128;
00829         y = v2.mVec128;
00830 
00831         v = vrecpeq_f32(y);                     // v ~ 1/y
00832         m = vrecpsq_f32(y, v);          // m = (2-v*y)
00833         v = vmulq_f32(v, m);            // vv = v*m ~~ 1/y
00834         m = vrecpsq_f32(y, v);          // mm = (2-vv*y)
00835         v = vmulq_f32(v, x);            // x*vv
00836         v = vmulq_f32(v, m);            // (x*vv)*(2-vv*y) = x*(vv(2-vv*y)) ~~~ x/y
00837 
00838         return b3Vector3(v);
00839 #else
00840         return b3MakeVector3(
00841                         v1.m_floats[0] / v2.m_floats[0],
00842                         v1.m_floats[1] / v2.m_floats[1],
00843                         v1.m_floats[2] / v2.m_floats[2]);
00844 #endif
00845 }
00846 
00848 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar
00849 b3Dot(const b3Vector3& v1, const b3Vector3& v2)
00850 {
00851         return v1.dot(v2);
00852 }

00902 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar b3Vector3::distance2(const b3Vector3& v) const
00903 {
00904         return (v - *this).length2();
00905 }
00906 
00907 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar b3Vector3::distance(const b3Vector3& v) const
00908 {
00909         return (v - *this).length();
00910 }
00911 
00912 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 b3Vector3::normalized() const
00913 {
00914 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00915         b3Vector3 norm = *this;
00916 
00917         return norm.normalize();
00918 #else
00919         return *this / length();
00920 #endif
00921 }
00922 
00923 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 b3Vector3::rotate( const b3Vector3& wAxis, const b3Scalar _angle ) const
00924 {
00925         // wAxis must be a unit lenght vector
00926 
00927 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00928 
00929     __m128 O = _mm_mul_ps(wAxis.mVec128, mVec128);
00930         b3Scalar ssin = b3Sin( _angle );
00931     __m128 C = wAxis.cross( b3MakeVector3(mVec128) ).mVec128;
00932         O = _mm_and_ps(O, b3vFFF0fMask);
00933     b3Scalar scos = b3Cos( _angle );
00934 
00935         __m128 vsin = _mm_load_ss(&ssin);       //      (S 0 0 0)
00936     __m128 vcos = _mm_load_ss(&scos);   //      (S 0 0 0)
00937 
00938         __m128 Y = b3_pshufd_ps(O, 0xC9);       //      (Y Z X 0)
00939         __m128 Z = b3_pshufd_ps(O, 0xD2);       //      (Z X Y 0)
00940         O = _mm_add_ps(O, Y);
00941         vsin = b3_pshufd_ps(vsin, 0x80);        //      (S S S 0)
00942         O = _mm_add_ps(O, Z);
00943     vcos = b3_pshufd_ps(vcos, 0x80);    //      (S S S 0)
00944 
00945     vsin = vsin * C;
00946         O = O * wAxis.mVec128;
00947         __m128 X = mVec128 - O;
00948 
00949     O = O + vsin;
00950         vcos = vcos * X;
00951         O = O + vcos;
00952 
00953         return b3MakeVector3(O);
00954 #else
00955         b3Vector3 o = wAxis * wAxis.dot( *this );
00956         b3Vector3 _x = *this - o;
00957         b3Vector3 _y;
00958 
00959         _y = wAxis.cross( *this );
00960 
00961         return ( o + _x * b3Cos( _angle ) + _y * b3Sin( _angle ) );
00962 #endif
00963 }
00964 
00965 B3_FORCE_INLINE   long    b3Vector3::maxDot( const b3Vector3 *array, long array_count, b3Scalar &dotOut ) const
00966 {
00967 #if defined (B3_USE_SSE) || defined (B3_USE_NEON)
00968     #if defined _WIN32 || defined (B3_USE_SSE)
00969         const long scalar_cutoff = 10;
00970         long b3_maxdot_large( const float *array, const float *vec, unsigned long array_count, float *dotOut );
00971     #elif defined B3_USE_NEON
00972         const long scalar_cutoff = 4;
00973         extern long (*_maxdot_large)( const float *array, const float *vec, unsigned long array_count, float *dotOut );
00974     #endif
00975     if( array_count < scalar_cutoff )
00976 #else
00977 
00978 #endif//B3_USE_SSE || B3_USE_NEON
00979     {
00980         b3Scalar maxDot = -B3_INFINITY;
00981         int i = 0;
00982         int ptIndex = -1;
00983         for( i = 0; i < array_count; i++ )
00984         {
00985             b3Scalar dot = array[i].dot(*this);
00986 
00987             if( dot > maxDot )
00988             {
00989                 maxDot = dot;
00990                 ptIndex = i;
00991             }
00992         }
00993 
00994                 b3Assert(ptIndex>=0);
00995         if (ptIndex<0)
00996                 {
00997                         ptIndex = 0;
00998                 }
00999         dotOut = maxDot;
01000         return ptIndex;
01001     }
01002 #if defined (B3_USE_SSE) || defined (B3_USE_NEON)
01003     return b3_maxdot_large( (float*) array, (float*) &m_floats[0], array_count, &dotOut );
01004 #endif
01005 }
01006 
01007 B3_FORCE_INLINE   long    b3Vector3::minDot( const b3Vector3 *array, long array_count, b3Scalar &dotOut ) const
01008 {
01009 #if defined (B3_USE_SSE) || defined (B3_USE_NEON)
01010     #if defined B3_USE_SSE
01011         const long scalar_cutoff = 10;
01012         long b3_mindot_large( const float *array, const float *vec, unsigned long array_count, float *dotOut );
01013     #elif defined B3_USE_NEON
01014         const long scalar_cutoff = 4;
01015         extern long (*b3_mindot_large)( const float *array, const float *vec, unsigned long array_count, float *dotOut );
01016     #else
01017         #error unhandled arch!
01018     #endif
01019 
01020     if( array_count < scalar_cutoff )
01021 #endif//B3_USE_SSE || B3_USE_NEON
01022     {
01023         b3Scalar  minDot = B3_INFINITY;
01024         int i = 0;
01025         int ptIndex = -1;
01026 
01027         for( i = 0; i < array_count; i++ )
01028         {
01029             b3Scalar dot = array[i].dot(*this);
01030 
01031             if( dot < minDot )
01032             {
01033                 minDot = dot;
01034                 ptIndex = i;
01035             }
01036         }
01037 
01038         dotOut = minDot;
01039 
01040         return ptIndex;
01041     }
01042 #if defined (B3_USE_SSE) || defined (B3_USE_NEON)
01043     return b3_mindot_large( (float*) array, (float*) &m_floats[0], array_count, &dotOut );
01044 #endif
01045 }

01057         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector4 absolute4() const
01058         {
01059 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE_IN_API) && defined (B3_USE_SSE)
01060                 return b3MakeVector4(_mm_and_ps(mVec128, b3vAbsfMask));
01061 #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
01062                 return b3Vector4(vabsq_f32(mVec128));
01063 #else
01064                 return b3MakeVector4(
01065                         b3Fabs(m_floats[0]),
01066                         b3Fabs(m_floats[1]),
01067                         b3Fabs(m_floats[2]),
01068                         b3Fabs(m_floats[3]));
01069 #endif
01070         }
01071 
01072 
01073         b3Scalar        getW() const { return m_floats[3];}
01074 
01075 
01076                 B3_FORCE_INLINE int maxAxis4() const
01077         {
01078                 int maxIndex = -1;
01079                 b3Scalar maxVal = b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT);
01080                 if (m_floats[0] > maxVal)
01081                 {
01082                         maxIndex = 0;
01083                         maxVal = m_floats[0];
01084                 }
01085                 if (m_floats[1] > maxVal)
01086                 {
01087                         maxIndex = 1;
01088                         maxVal = m_floats[1];
01089                 }
01090                 if (m_floats[2] > maxVal)
01091                 {
01092                         maxIndex = 2;
01093                         maxVal =m_floats[2];
01094                 }
01095                 if (m_floats[3] > maxVal)
01096                 {
01097                         maxIndex = 3;
01098                 }
01099 
01100                 return maxIndex;
01101         }
01102 
01103 
01104         B3_FORCE_INLINE int minAxis4() const
01105         {
01106                 int minIndex = -1;
01107                 b3Scalar minVal = b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT);
01108                 if (m_floats[0] < minVal)
01109                 {
01110                         minIndex = 0;
01111                         minVal = m_floats[0];
01112                 }
01113                 if (m_floats[1] < minVal)
01114                 {
01115                         minIndex = 1;
01116                         minVal = m_floats[1];
01117                 }
01118                 if (m_floats[2] < minVal)
01119                 {
01120                         minIndex = 2;
01121                         minVal =m_floats[2];
01122                 }
01123                 if (m_floats[3] < minVal)
01124                 {
01125                         minIndex = 3;
01126                         minVal = m_floats[3];
01127                 }
01128 
01129                 return minIndex;
01130         }
01131 
01132 
01133         B3_FORCE_INLINE int closestAxis4() const
01134         {
01135                 return absolute4().maxAxis4();
01136         }

01172 
01174 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    b3SwapScalarEndian(const b3Scalar& sourceVal, b3Scalar& destVal)
01175 {
01176         #ifdef B3_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01177         unsigned char* dest = (unsigned char*) &destVal;
01178         unsigned char* src  = (unsigned char*) &sourceVal;
01179         dest[0] = src[7];
01180     dest[1] = src[6];
01181     dest[2] = src[5];
01182     dest[3] = src[4];
01183     dest[4] = src[3];
01184     dest[5] = src[2];
01185     dest[6] = src[1];
01186     dest[7] = src[0];
01187 #else
01188         unsigned char* dest = (unsigned char*) &destVal;
01189         unsigned char* src  = (unsigned char*) &sourceVal;
01190         dest[0] = src[3];
01191     dest[1] = src[2];
01192     dest[2] = src[1];
01193     dest[3] = src[0];
01194 #endif //B3_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
01195 }
01197 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    b3SwapVector3Endian(const b3Vector3& sourceVec, b3Vector3& destVec)
01198 {
01199         for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
01200         {
01201                 b3SwapScalarEndian(sourceVec[i],destVec[i]);
01202         }
01203 
01204 }
01205 
01207 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    b3UnSwapVector3Endian(b3Vector3& vector)
01208 {
01209 
01210         b3Vector3       swappedVec;
01211         for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
01212         {
01213                 b3SwapScalarEndian(vector[i],swappedVec[i]);
01214         }
01215         vector = swappedVec;
01216 }
01217 
01218 template <class T>
01219 B3_FORCE_INLINE void b3PlaneSpace1 (const T& n, T& p, T& q)
01220 {
01221   if (b3Fabs(n[2]) > B3_SQRT12) {
01222     // choose p in y-z plane
01223     b3Scalar a = n[1]*n[1] + n[2]*n[2];
01224     b3Scalar k = b3RecipSqrt (a);
01225     p[0] = 0;
01226         p[1] = -n[2]*k;
01227         p[2] = n[1]*k;
01228     // set q = n x p
01229     q[0] = a*k;
01230         q[1] = -n[0]*p[2];
01231         q[2] = n[0]*p[1];
01232   }
01233   else {
01234     // choose p in x-y plane
01235     b3Scalar a = n[0]*n[0] + n[1]*n[1];
01236     b3Scalar k = b3RecipSqrt (a);
01237     p[0] = -n[1]*k;
01238         p[1] = n[0]*k;
01239         p[2] = 0;
01240     // set q = n x p
01241     q[0] = -n[2]*p[1];
01242         q[1] = n[2]*p[0];
01243         q[2] = a*k;
01244   }
01245 }
